name: Teharth: The Robots of Advenus
description:
(Available in English, Japanese and Portuguese.)

An arena shooter where the player controls a robot that casts elemental magics. It is possible to change the magic element in real time. The enemies also have elements, so the player must always be careful if he is using the same element against the enemy.

Note: The Dark Mode is unlocked when Arcade Mode is finished.
